item.title: By: Charles McKeever

item.description:
Hi Mike,
Here are links to the post by Chris and a few other excellent resources.
http://www.develephant.net/an-rpg-themed-oop-design-pattern-for-corona-sdk-part-1/ http://www.develephant.net/an-rpg-themed-oop-design-pattern-for-corona-sdk-part-2/ http://roaminggamer.com/2014/06/17/oops-easy-object-hiearchies-for-corona-sdk-games/ http://www.omidahourai.com/from-zero-to-oo-ardentkids-guide-to-object-oriented-lua-with-corona-sdk
Hope that helps :)
item.content:encoded:
